rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: North-facing entrance with minimalistic design and subtle Scandinavian aesthetics. Features an open space leading to the living area.

rooms.name: Living Area & Open-Plan Kitchen
rooms.description: Open-plan space combining kitchen and living room, featuring modern minimalist decor, large windows for natural light, and a seamless flow between spaces.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious guest room with built-in storage and soft Scandinavian tones. Adjacent to the main areas for easy access.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Functional bathroom integrated within the ground floor, designed with clean lines and modern fixtures.

openings.description: Large windows for natural light in the living area and kitchen.
Provides an outdoor connection from the living area.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with a private en-suite bathroom and north-facing window for optimal light.

rooms.name: Bathroom - Master
rooms.description: En-suite bathroom with modern fixtures and minimalist design, aligned with Vastu principles by facing the south-east direction to enhance positive energy.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: Fully-equipped private gym featuring mirrored walls and high-performance equipment. Positioned away from living areas to maintain quietude.

rooms.name: Servant Quarters
rooms.description: Compact, functional space for the household staff with a small bathroom attached, located near service access points.

openings.description: Elegant staircase connecting ground and first floor, designed in Scandinavian style.
Balcony attached to the master bedroom for relaxation and fresh air.
